String.string: [Apex] One More Time
Use the invitation to teleport to Velika.
"Thanks again."
Speak with Nerinder.
Velika Banquet Entrance
You arrived at the Banquet.
Talk to Nerinder and teleport to the Velika Banquet.
"This should be much better than last time."
Talk to Verdas. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"I hope we meet again soon."
Speak with Mystel. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"Thanks. I'll go see him."
Speak with Kamilia. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]

"I’m looking for Seir."
Go to Headquarters. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"It was a pleasure to meet you."

That man looks exactly like Verdas.
Talk to him. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"Thank you, sir. You have fun, too."
Speak to Seir. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"Not before? That's probably for the best."
Speak to Meren to get information about the celebration. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
Watch the play.
Go to the theater in front of Headquarters. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
Watch the play. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"I'll be more than glad to see that."
Speak with Miriam. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"I'm sure she's fine. Enjoy your meal!"
Speak to the townsfolk you couldn’t save before. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
Seir is about to deliver his speech.

It’s time for the speech.
Go to the stage. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"I... thank you, sir."
Congratulate Seir. [Talk to Nerinder, who’s near {@linkcreature:63#1604#Maius}, to get to the Velika Banquet Redux.]
"I'm sure it will. Thank you!"
Talk to Seir.
